description: Available in English. Medical Abbreviation Pal is a great tool for anyone in the medical field that needs to use medical abbreviations for charts, records, or data entry. MAP includes over 850 of the most commonly used abbreviations and there meanings, with options to search easily and quickly. You can save your favorite or most commonly used abbreviations, or copy them with there definitions to the clip board. If your a student and want to study, memorize or learn them, your in luck, this app includes a flashcard practice area. You can go through the "cards" randomly, or in alphabetical order. You can also just study the ones you have saved. If you want to start with the meaning, you can do that too. Doctor, Nurse, Administrator, or Student, you will find this a handy reference. If you find any abbreviations missing, please let me know, and I will add them. As always, please email me  any bugs, feature requests, or errors. Please don't leave a negative comment to tell me about a bug. coolate@gmail.com
